title: I Looked Everywhere
subtle: Personal (fiction), 61 words, Level C (Grade K), Lexile 130L
description: Students all know about not being able to find something. I Looked Everywhere illustrates this common problem, providing several different solutions students are sure to have tried. Pictures and repetitive text support the beginning reader.
meta: closet, everywhere, looked, shoe, toy box, under
Use the reading strategy of retelling to understand the story
Problem and Solution : Identify the story elements of problem and solution
Punctuation : Recognize and discriminate between question marks and periods
Position Words : Understand and locate position words

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
